feed.title: React Navigation Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest React Navigation news and events.

entry.title: React Navigation 2.0
entry.summary:
The documentation is now live at https://reactnavigation.org, and v1 lives on at https://v1.reactnavigation.org.
## Significant breaking changes
The following changes are considered “significant” because they can’t be fixed by search and replace o

entry.title: 2.0 release candidate
entry.summary: Exactly two months after the release of React Navigation 1.0, we are close to another major version release. We’d like to invite developers that use the library to give the release candidate a try in your app and let us know if you encounter any issu

entry.title: React Navigation 1.0 (goodbye, beta!)
entry.summary: As of today, React Navigation version 1.0 has been released! To see a list of recent improvements leading up to the release, refer to the “[Renewed Path to React Navigation V1.0](https://github.com/react-navigation/react-navigation/issues/2585)” issu
